lead_paragraph: Because of an editing error, a Sports of The Times column on Sunday about efforts to renovate Fenway Park without damaging its traditional charm misstated, in some editions, the source of the phrase “do no harm.” It is from Hippocrates’ work “Epidemics,” not from the Hippocratic oath.
